section.44: The Book of the Merits of the Companions

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:By Him in Whose Hand is the life of Muhammad, (the tribes of) Ghifar, Aslam, Muzaina, or from the tribe of Juhaina or from the tribe of Muzaina, they would be better in the eye of Allah than Asad, Tayyi, and Ghatfan on the Day of Resurrection
